attributes.action: to criminalise bullying if the victim takes their own life
attributes.background: There are some laws in place that a bully could be tried for However if bullying takes place and the victim takes there own life currently nothing happens. In Brighton a 12 year old boy took his own life due to bullying. If the bullies are caught they will be expelled from school which isn’t enough.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232431

Alternatively you could start a new petition calling for a criminal offence of "bullying leading to loss of life" if that's something you would like to see happen.
